description:
Flintlock's opening hour is fantastically-paced and very fun! From the fun movement and combat to the story and souls-like qualities. Here are my first impressions of Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn. Available on Xbox (Game Pass), PC, and PlayStation on July 18, 2024. The demo is currently available on Steam.

Gameplay footage via: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIGZddh3nu4&feature=youtu.be

#FlintlockTheSiegeofDawn #soulslike #xboxgamepass

title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn is NOT What I Expected
